name: Colt 45
description:
Introduction

Wetsuit recommended. SandTrap and water anchor required.

Caution!!! : 300 ft rappel ***

The longest rappel can be done as a 200 ft to a hanging pot hole and 125 ft as a 2 stage rappel. Hanging pot hole is a difficult pull so 300 ft rope plus 300 ft of strong pull line is advised.

There are at least 3 rappels over 125 ft in this canyon. Do not get stranded ... Bring enough rope!

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Permit required from the Navajo Nation.

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

https://dyeclan.com/outdooractivities/canyoneering/?id=680

Background
